name: sea surface height
dataset_parameters: SSH: dynamic sea surface height; SSHNOIBC: sea surface height above the geoid without the inverse barometer correction from atmospheric pressure; SSHIBC: the inverse barometer correction from atmospheric pressure; and ETAN: model sea level. Note, both SSH and SSHNOIBC are corrected for global mean density changes in the volume-conserving Boussinesq model (the so-called Greatbatch correction) and sea-ice pressure loading.

name: ocean bottom pressure
description: Parameters include ocean bottom pressure, with and without the contribution from atmospheric pressure loading, and ocean bottom pressure anomalies with respect to 2005-2010 means. Note: ocean bottom pressure fields are provided in terms of equivalent water height.

name: ocean and sea-ice surface freshwater fluxes
fields: EXFpreci, EXFevap, EXFroff, SIsnPrcp, EXFempmr, oceFWflx, SIatmFW, SFLUX, SIacSubl, SIrsSubl, SIfwThru
dataset_description: Parameters include freshwater flxues from precipitation, evaporation, runoff, and sublimation across the air/ocean and air/sea-ice/snow interfaces.

name: ocean and sea-ice surface heat fluxes
fields: EXFhl, EXFhs, EXFlwdn, EXFswdn, EXFqnet, oceQnet, SIatmQnt, TFLUX, EXFswnet, EXFlwnet, oceQsw, SIaaflux
dataset_description: Parameters include latent, sensible, and short- and longwave radiative heat fluxes across the air/ocean and air/sea-ice/snow interfaces.

name: atmosphere surface state
fields: EXFatemp, EXFaqh, EXFpress, EXFewind, EXFnwind, EXFwspee
dataset_description: Parameters include atmosphere temperature, humidity, pressure, winds in the zonal and meridional directions, and total wind speed.

name: ocean and sea-ice surface stress
dataset_description: Parameters include surface wind stress on the ocean and sea-ice surfaces in the meridional and zonal directions, and total ocean surface stress including contributions from sea-ice drag.

name: sea-ice and snow concentration and thickness
dataset_description: Parameters include sea-ice concentration, mean sea-ice and snow thickness, and sea-ice pressure loading.

name: sea-ice velocity
dataset_description: Parameters include sea-ice velocity in the zonal and meridional directions.

name: ocean temperature and salinity
dataset_description: Parameters include seawater potential temperature and salinity.

name: ocean density, stratification, and hydrostatic pressure
dataset_description: Parameters include seawater density, vertical stratification, and hydrostatic pressure accounting.

name: ocean velocity
dataset_description: Parameters include ocean velocity in the zonal, meridional, and vertical directions.

name: Gent-McWilliams ocean bolus velocity
dataset_description: Parameters include the Gent-McWilliams ocean bolus velocity in the zonal, meridional, and vertical directions.

name: ocean three-dimensional parameterized mixing coefficients
dataset_description: Parameters include the time-invariant three-dimensional coefficients for vertical diffusivity, Gent-McWilliams cross-isopycnal diffusivity, and Redi along-isopycnal diffusivity.
